dao.name: QRY_HFD_USE_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, item_cod, item_nam, view_seq, sys_default, co_notice, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr, (select min(begin_dat) from hfd_use_dt where athena_id = hfd_use_rf.athena_id and hotel_cod = hfd_use_rf.hotel_cod and item_cod = hfd_use_rf.item_cod and action_cod = 'add' ) begin_dat, (select max(end_dat) from hfd_use_dt where athena_id = hfd_use_rf.athena_id and hotel_cod = hfd_use_rf.hotel_cod and item_cod = hfd_use_rf.item_cod and action_cod = 'add' ) end_dat from hfd_use_rf where athena_id = trim(:athena_id) and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by view_seq, item_cod

dao.name: QRY_SINGLE_HFD_USE_RF
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, item_cod, item_nam, view_seq, sys_default, co_notice, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_use_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and item_cod = :item_cod

dao.name: QRY_HFD_USE_DT
dao.statement: select athena_id, hotel_cod, key_nos, item_cod, item_qnt, begin_dat, end_dat, action_cod, status_cod, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr from hfd_use_dt where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_HFD_USE_DT_ITEM_COD
dao.statement: select item_cod, item_nam from hfd_use_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) order by decode(view_seq, -1, 999999, view_seq), item_cod

dao.name: R_PMS0820050_ADD
dao.statement: select nvl(max(view_seq),0) + 1 as view_seq from hfd_use_rf where athena_id = :athena and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)
